prompt:
Schrijf gedetailleerde user stories in Gherkin-formaat voor de volgende BMAD frontend requirements:
    
    
    BMAD Frontend Dashboard Requirements:
    
    1. Agent Status Monitoring
       - Real-time status van alle agents
       - Agent logs en error handling
       - Agent performance metrics
    
    2. Workflow Management
       - Workflows starten/bekijken
       - Workflow status tracking
       - Human-in-the-loop (HITL) alerts
    
    3. API Testing Interface
       - Swagger UI integratie
       - API endpoint testing
       - Response logging
    
    4. Slack Integration Status
       - Bot status monitoring
       - Channel membership
       - Message history
    
    5. Metrics Dashboard
       - Workflow metrics
       - Agent performance
       - System health
    
    6. Configuration Management
       - Environment variables
       - Agent settings
       - System configuration
    
    
    Geef voor elk onderdeel (1-6) een user story met acceptatiecriteria.
    Focus op functionaliteit die het team nodig heeft om BMAD effectief te gebruiken.
answer:
# 1. Agent Status Monitoring

Feature: Agent Status Monitoring

  As a user
  I want to see the real-time status of all agents
  So that I can monitor their availability and activity

  Scenario: Viewing real-time agent statuses
    Given I am logged into the BMAD dashboard
    When I navigate to the Agent Status Monitoring page
    Then I should see a list of all agents with their current status indicators

  Scenario: Viewing agent logs and handling errors
    Given an agent encounters an error
    When I select that agent
    Then I should see the recent logs and error messages associated with the agent

  Scenario: Viewing agent performance metrics
    When I view the agent details
    Then I should see performance metrics such as response time, throughput, and uptime

# 2. Workflow Management

Feature: Workflow Management

  As a user
  I want to start, view, and track workflows
  So that I can manage automation processes effectively

  Scenario: Starting a new workflow
    Given I am on the Workflow Management page
    When I select "Start New Workflow"
    And I configure the workflow parameters
    Then the workflow should begin executing

  Scenario: Viewing workflow status
    Given a workflow is running
    When I select a specific workflow
    Then I should see its current status and progress details

  Scenario: Receiving Human-in-the-loop (HITL) alerts
    When a workflow requires human input
    Then I should receive an alert indicating the need for manual intervention

# 3. API Testing Interface

Feature: API Testing Interface

  As a user
  I want to test API endpoints via Swagger UI
  So that I can validate API responses and troubleshoot issues

  Scenario: Accessing Swagger UI
    Given I am on the API Testing page
    When I open the Swagger UI interface
    Then I should see all available API endpoints documented

  Scenario: Testing an API endpoint
    When I select an endpoint and input test data
    And I execute the test
    Then I should see the API response displayed

  Scenario: Logging API responses
    When an API response is received
    Then the response should be logged for review and troubleshooting
